items.title: Nigeria police confirm mass church abductions after previous denial
items.description: More than 160 people were reportedly taken from three churches in the northern Kaduna state.

items.title: Ryanair boss thanks Elon Musk for 'boost' in ticket sales after online row
items.description: Musk and Ryanair boss Michael O'Leary have called each other "idiots" in recent days, but the airline executive says it's helping lift sales

items.title: Life sentence for man who killed Japan's ex-PM Shinzo Abe
items.description: Abe's assassination stunned the country where there is virtually no gun crime.

items.title: Detained veteran Ugandan opposition figure critically ill in hospital, his party says
items.description: Kizza Besigyeâ€™s party says his condition is critical, but authorities say he was taken to hospital for a routine check-up.

items.title: Japan restarts world's largest nuclear plant
items.description: Japan restars a reactor at the world's largest nuclear plant nearly 15 years after the Fukushima disaster.
